fr.enstb.xmlcode
Interface XMLSerializable

public interface XMLSerializable

Classes implementing interface XMLSerializable could be instancied and coded from/to XML strings and streams.

No special behaviour has to be implemented in your XMLSerializable objects, since it is done via an externaly defined mapping (see XMLMapping). This interface just help the programmer to remember that this class xml serialization MUST be described somewhere.
Note that it means that you can encode/decode into/from XML all types of classes, since you just have to declare those classes as implementing this interface..

Author:
Sylvain Guerin
